about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the exciting world of Park Ranger Simulator and take over the management of your park in a huge, lively open world. Take on all the tasks that need to be done as a park ranger - either alone or together with friends in cross-platform multiplayer!

Do you have what it takes to master the challenges ahead and manage your park successfully?

Take up the challenge in Park Ranger Simulator!

Gameworld

Discover an open world of almost 20 km2 full of different animals that can only be found in different biomes. Complete missions in the extensive forests of the park and equip yourself with the necessary equipment in one of the two towns. In addition to completing missions, you can of course freely explore the extensive game world.

Missions

Master a total of 50 varied missions that authentically reflect the day-to-day work of a Park Ranger. From repair work and extinguishing forest fires to felling and removing trees, there are many different challenges to master.

Always keep an eye on various factors such as the condition of the park and the animal population ratio, as these influence the rating of your park and therefore also your finances.

The integrated economic system allows you to buy new vehicles, tools, weapons and many other items of equipment to successfully fulfil your duties as a park ranger. It is therefore important to keep a constant eye on your park's rating and your finances.

Vehicles

A total of six vehicles are available to help you overcome the upcoming challenges in the large game world. These include cars, boats and even a helicopter so that you are flexible on the road, on water, in the air and can get to the various mission locations quickly.

Features

  • Large game world with different biomes and cities

  • Upgradeable and expandable ranger camps

  • Build, repair and maintain the park

  • Dynamic day and night cycle

  • Dynamic weather

  • 6 different vehicles

  • A variety of animals

  • 50 varied missions

  • Cross-Platform Multiplayer

  • Different equipment

short_description: Manage your own park facility in a huge open world in Park Ranger Simulator. Take on all the tasks that need to be completed as a park ranger - alone or together in cross-platform multiplayer! You have a variety of vehicles and equipment at your disposal to complete the challenges ahead!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
